job description:
GENERAL FUNCTION: Join team dedicated to providing actionable insights and identifying emerging risks, trends and opportunities for Finance and business leaders across the organization. Conduct high-impact research and analytics using sophisticated testing and modeling techniques to address most pressing business issues and questions. Provide thought leadership in navigating ambiguity and solving problems. Will take a lead role in testing and modeling in a big data environment.

ESSENTIAL DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES:
  • Play a lead role in developing emerging financial analytics to drive results and help influence business decisions.
  • Serve as thought leader and analytic partner to address high priority issues across lines of business, both proactively and as requested.
  • Create insightful financial reviews and reporting to identify and illustrate the key stories and trends in the numbers and supplement financial schedules.
  • Analyze business performance, make recommendations for improvements and measure progress.
  • Help guide sound financial forecasting and planning reflecting identification and projection of key drivers.
  • Prepare presentations and discussion documents to highlight business issues and opportunities.
  • Establish and foster working relationships with peers and leadership in Finance and across lines of business.
  • Partner with Business Intelligence team and Finance leads to drive towards the most accurate data possible.
  • Help share learnings and best practices across portfolios.
  • Provide guidance and mentorship to junior analysts and team members less experienced in analytics.
MINIMUM KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS AND ABILITIES REQUIRED:

Education: Bachelor's degree required. Relevant Masters preferred.

Experience: Typical hire requires minimum of three years of experience with proven results using analytics to drive business decisions, ideally in a Finance role.

Other Skills:
  • Strong self-starter who can drive forward individually and as part of a team.
  • Experience with advanced methods for testing and validation, market segmentation, A/B testing, multi-level mixed effects modeling, advanced time series analysis, SEM, GMM, DS/GE, constrained optimization
  • Preferred tools: Hadoop, SQL, R, Stata, Matlab.
  • Demonstrated ability to navigate ambiguity and excel in a fast-pasted environment with few established processes or frameworks. Resourceful and can-do attitude.
  • Passion for using problem solving skills to drive towards accurate and actionable business insights.
  • Proven ability to tailor approach in order to partner effectively across the organization.
  • Excellent communication and team skills necessary to influence across the organization, especially without formal authority.
WORKING CONDITIONS:
  • Normal office environment with little exposure to dust, noise, temperature and the like.
  • Extended viewing of CRT screen.
Equal Opportunity Employer Minorities/Women/Protected Veterans/Disabled
